akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of the Minority and Women-Owned Business Assessment Program.

akn:content.akn:p: There is established the Minority and Women-Owned Business Assessment Program (“Program”) within the Department of Small and Local Business Development (“Department”). The Program shall:

The Department shall submit the findings and recommendations of the Program to the Chairman of the Council’s Committee on Economic Development in the form of a report or reports. Specific steps for implementing the recommendations shall accompany the report or reports.
For the purposes of this subchapter, the term “minority” shall include Asian, Pacific Islander, African American or Black, Native American or Native Hawaiian, and Hispanic or Latino.
